name: Emerald Mine
description:
Emerald Mine for iOS with 6,000+ levels.

Game Center global high scores.

A port of the classic Amiga game built using the Rocks N Diamonds codebase

In Emerald Mine you play as a miner trapped deep underground. Your objective is to collect the minimum number of gems to open the exit portals. Explore the caves to find all the gems and try to avoid the hazards which include exploding bugs, tanks, aliens and acid pools. Be careful of falling boulders and debris as they will crush you.

Relive the classic Amiga game, Emerald Mine. This is a fan port of the game updated to play on all iOS devices. All classic art and sounds are included as well as the original levels for Emerald Mine 1, 2 and 3 plus some bonus levels from the Emerald Mine archive. In total there are more than 6,000 levels.

Swipe gestures on the right half of the screen to move your character. Tap and hold on the left side then swipe on the right side to grab a nearby block.

Timed and relaxed play modes.

MFi controllers supported
